about_the_game:
Dive into the demon-infested depths of Purgatory Survivors, a top-down shooter with roguelike elements. Battle against overwhelming odds in a dark fantasy world, where demons and despair conspire to ensure your failure. Select your character and wield a deadly arsenal of primary and secondary guns, becoming a master shooter in this intense top-down bullet hell. Surviving the trials requires strategic choices in upgrading your abilities. Can you overcome the relentless onslaught and emerge victorious?

FEATURES

  • Shoot where you aim.

  • 49 unique upgrades (and growing).

  • Collect souls to spend them on 20+ meta progress upgrades.

  • Choose from 6 characters with their own unique stats and inherent upgrades.

  • Choose from 20 guns (more to come).

  • 3 stages with varying difficulties (including endless).

  • Full controller support + tested on Steam Deck.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content and Gore

short_description: Purgatory Survivors is a top-down shooter with roguelike elements. Plunge into a dark fantasy world infested with demons and despair all fighting for you to fail. Choose your character, primary and secondary guns, and achieve the best synergy with the upgrades to pass the purgatory trial.
